biotools.summary: Ribo-ODDR : Based on given pilot sequencing data and rRNA sequences, Ribo-ODDR pipeline designs oligos complementary to rRNA sequences and computes their depleting potentials in pilot Ribo-seq data. The tool outputs all oligo designs that pass user-defined filtering criterias, which are explained in later sections. Oligo designs are reported in FASTA, BED, GFF and CSV formats, and if needed, off-target information is outputted in TXT format.
